languages.text: "Те две семьи, что умерли первыми, с ними водились. Торговали чем-то. И подцепили какую-то мутантскую заразу. Точно знаю, подцепили! Эти мутанты живучие очень, болеют всякой дрянью, но не мрут от нее. А простые люди — очень даже мрут!"

"The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"
languages.original_text: "Те две семьи, что умерли первыми, с ними водились. Торговали чем-то. И подцепили какую-то мутантскую заразу. Точно знаю, подцепили! Эти мутанты живучие очень, болеют всякой дрянью, но не мрут от нее. А простые люди — очень даже мрут!"

traits.locale_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people do, very much so!"

"The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people do, very much so!"

"The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

"The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

"The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

languages.text: “最先死的那两家人和那群变种人做过买卖。他们交易了什么东西，之后就染上了变种人的病。我知道，肯定就是这样！那群变种人身体非常结实。他们一直在生病，但无论怎样都不会病死，可普通人就不一样了！”
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: “最先死的那两家人和那群变种人做过买卖。他们交易了什么东西，之后就染上了变种人的病。我知道，肯定就是这样！那群变种人身体非常结实。他们一直在生病，但无论怎样都不会病死，可普通人就不一样了！”

languages.text: «Las dos familias que murieron en primer lugar trataban con ellos. Comerciaban con algo. Y pillaron una plaga mutante. ¡No me cabe duda! Los mutantes son duros. Siempre están enfermos de algo, pero no se mueren por ello. ¡Pero la gente normal sí!».
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: «Las dos familias que murieron en primer lugar trataban con ellos. Comerciaban con algo. Y pillaron una plaga mutante. ¡No me cabe duda! Los mutantes son duros. Siempre están enfermos de algo, pero no se mueren por ello. ¡Pero la gente normal sí!».

languages.text: 「最初に死んだ2組の家族は、変異体と取引をしていました。何かの受け渡しをしていたんです。それからあの家族達は変異体の病にかかってしまって…奴らのせいです！変異体はとてつもなく頑丈で、常に何かの病気を患っているけど死ぬことはない。でも普通の人間では耐えられません！」
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: 「最初に死んだ2組の家族は、変異体と取引をしていました。何かの受け渡しをしていたんです。それからあの家族達は変異体の病にかかってしまって…奴らのせいです！変異体はとてつもなく頑丈で、常に何かの病気を患っているけど死ぬことはない。でも普通の人間では耐えられません！」

languages.text: "Die zwei Familien, die zuerst starben, hatten etwas mit ihnen zu schaffen. Irgendein Handel. Und sie haben sich irgendeine Mutantenseuche geholt. Ich bin ganz sicher! Diese Mutanten sind sehr zäh und immer irgendwie krank, aber sie sterben nicht daran. Aber normale Menschen schon!"
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: "Die zwei Familien, die zuerst starben, hatten etwas mit ihnen zu schaffen. Irgendein Handel. Und sie haben sich irgendeine Mutantenseuche geholt. Ich bin ganz sicher! Diese Mutanten sind sehr zäh und immer irgendwie krank, aber sie sterben nicht daran. Aber normale Menschen schon!"

languages.text: « Les deux premières familles à mourir les premières, elles les côtoyaient. Pour des échanges. Et elles ont attrapé leurs germes. Je le sais ! Ces mutants sont très résistants, ils sont toujours malades, mais ça les tue jamais. Par contre, pour les gens ordinaires, c'est fatal ! »
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: « Les deux premières familles à mourir les premières, elles les côtoyaient. Pour des échanges. Et elles ont attrapé leurs germes. Je le sais ! Ces mutants sont très résistants, ils sont toujours malades, mais ça les tue jamais. Par contre, pour les gens ordinaires, c'est fatal ! »

languages.text: "İlk ölen iki aile, onlarla bir iş çeviriyordu. Bir alışveriş döndü, mutant belasına da öyle yakalandılar. Kesin bundan oldu! Bu mutantlar çok dayanıklı, hastalıktan kurtulamıyor ama ölmüyorlar da. Bizim gibilere bulaşınca iş değişiyor tabii!"
languages.original_text: "The two families who died first, they had dealings with them. Traded something. And they caught some mutant blight. I know they did! Those mutants are very tough, they're always sick with something, but they don't die of it. But ordinary people definitely do!"

traits.locale_text: "İlk ölen iki aile onlarla bir iş çeviriyordu. Bir alışveriş döndü, mutant belasına da öyle yakalandılar. Kesin öyle! Bu mutantlar çok dayanıklı, hastalıktan kurtulamıyor ama ölmüyorlar da. Bizim gibilere bulaşınca iş değişiyor tabii!"
